## SDG index score in Spain by Region 2018

This is analysis of the SDG accomplishment for regions in Spain. It is based on the analysis of the performance for different cities within each region in 2018 done by REDS (credits below).

## Datasets

- Original: The dataset used for this study is based on the dataset provided by RE-DS Spain (Credits below). Find it [**here**](http://reds-sdsn.es/wp-content/uploads/2018/10/Spanish-Cities-Index_para-publicacio%CC%81n-web.xlsx)

- Modified: /data/ods-es-cities-by-regions-2018.xlsx"


## SDG index plotted by region


```{r echo=FALSE, out.width="100%", fig.align='center'}
knitr::include_graphics("figs\\ods_2018_index_1_1.png")
```


## Is this a solid approach to show region SDG index score?

As the index per region is calculated with the average of each city within the region we want to show how many cities were analysed for each region. See red bars in the following chart.

Note the regions with one single observed city are present in both extremes of the ranking.

```{r echo=FALSE, out.width="100%", fig.align='center'}
knitr::include_graphics("figs\\ods_2018_index_region_1_1.png")
```
